title: Phil1.1
body:
Rise and Shine! Criminals to investigate! Cases to crack!
(CLick in the dialogoue option you want to choose) [[Answer:Player2.X|Player2.1]] [[Answer:Player2.2|Player2.2]]

title: Player2.1
body: Ugh my head, it isn't even noon yet. Why did you wake me for no reason? [[Answer:Phil3.11|Phil3.1]]

title: Player2.2
body: We haven't investigated real criminals in weeks, just cheating spouses [[Answer:Phil3.2|Phil3.2]]

title: Phil3.2
body: But today could be the day! [[Answer:Player4.1|Player4.1]]

title: Phil3.1
body: I had an excellent reason! Today could be the day! [[Answer:Player4.1|Player4.1]]
